title: Investment Portfolio Strategies
description: Advanced portfolio construction, asset allocation strategies, rebalancing techniques, tax-efficient investing, and diversification approaches. Building on investment type fundamentals, this chapter teaches students how to construct, manage, and optimize investment portfolios aligned with financial goals.
learning_objectives: Design appropriate asset allocations based on age, goals, and risk tolerance
Implement effective diversification strategies across and within asset classes
Apply rebalancing techniques to maintain target allocations and manage risk
Evaluate tax-efficient investment strategies and account type selection
Create comprehensive investment portfolios optimized for long-term wealth building

skill_builder.title: Advanced Portfolio Builder
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students construct diversified portfolios, test asset allocations, implement rebalancing strategies, optimize for taxes, and evaluate performance across different market conditions and life stages.
